name: Pants are for Peasants
description:
IF YOU HAVE TROUBLES WITH THE WEB BUILD, TRY THE WINDOWS FILES.
LEFT AND RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON TO CLIMB, THE FANS WILL TELL YOU THE OBSTACLES THAT WILL COME (REMEMBER THE ORDER).

Climb up The Wall and try to dodge barrels, piano's, swords, chairs and those peasanty pants. Because pants are for peasants and royalty doesn't need any of those. On your quest to climb The Wall, peasants will help you by warning you about upcoming dangers. Turns out those low-ranked annoying little fellas are pretty useful after all, eh?

Programming by Deaddanger & Pincellox

Art by Jens Steenmetz

Music by Mufaya
